sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { select } from 'd3' function Appa() { const [data, setData] = useState([10, 25, 50, 63, 91]) const svgRef = useRef() useEffect(() => { const svg = select(svgRef.current) svg .selectAll("circle") .data(data) .join( enter => enter .append("circle") .attr("class", "new") , update => update.attr("class", "updated"), exit => exit.remove() ) }, [data]) return (
) } export default Appa
